notifications_disabled_message: To receive notifications, please enable them in settings.
qibla_instructions: For an accurate result: hold your phone flat, away from metal objects and magnets. If the compass spins wildly, move it in a figure-eight motion to calibrate.
no_hadith_found: No hadith found for this chapter.
book_unavailable: This book is not yet available.
no_text: No text available for this hadith.

abouts.title: About the app
abouts.subtitle: Complete Islamic Application
abouts.description: This free app (currently ad-free) supports you daily in your religious practice: accurate prayer times, Qibla direction, Quran reading, automatic dhikr, authentic hadiths, Hijri calendar, and much more. A premium ad-free version with exclusive features will be available soon.
abouts.blessing: بارك الله فيكم - May Allah bless you
abouts.features_subtitle: Everything you need for your Islamic practice:
abouts.faq_location_question: Why does the app need my location?
abouts.faq_location_answer: Location is needed to accurately calculate prayer times according to your geographical position. You can also enter your city manually.
abouts.faq_notifications_answer: Check that notifications are enabled in your phone settings and that battery optimization is disabled for the app.
abouts.faq_qibla_question: How can I improve Qibla accuracy?
abouts.faq_qibla_answer: Hold your phone flat, away from metal objects. Make figure-8 movements to calibrate the compass if it's unstable.
abouts.faq_offline_answer: Yes, once configured, the app works offline for prayer times, Qibla, dhikr, and Quran reading.
abouts.email_template:
Hello Drogbinho,

Regarding {{subject}}:

[Your message here]

Thank you for this excellent app!

Best regards
abouts.developer_bio: Passionate developer, practicing Muslim, creator of useful apps for the community.
abouts.islamic_authenticity: ✅ All religious sources are verified and authentic
abouts.privacy_policy_content:
This app respects your privacy:

• Your data stays on your device
• No personal information collection
• Location used only for calculations
• Currently no ads
• Free app with premium version coming
abouts.terms_content:
By using this app:

• You agree to use it in accordance with Islamic values
• The app offers a free version and a premium version
• Developer does their best to ensure accuracy
• Always verify with your local mosque
• Use at your own risk
abouts.footer_thanks: May Allah reward you for using this app! 🤲
abouts.closing_dua: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ

translation_not_available: English translation not available for this book.
mosque_search_timeout: Search taking too long, please try again
asmaulhusna_search_placeholder: Search by name, meaning, or transliteration...

dhikr.title: Dhikr & Duas
dhikr.no_dhikr: No dhikr found for this category.

no_hadith_found_or_connection_error: No hadith found or connection error.
no_search_results: No hadith found for this search
adhan_notification_body: It is time to pray {{prayer}}! May Allah accept your prayer.
adhan_completed_body: The call to prayer has taken place
changes_will_be_active: Your new settings will be taken into account for future notifications.
welcome_personalization_description: To offer you a more personal experience, could you tell us your first name or nickname?
nom_allah_du_jour: Name of Allah of the Day
learning_footer: This section helps you learn the basics of Islamic prayer
wudu_invocation_translation: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
wudu_step_2: Wash hands three times up to the wrists
wudu_step_3: Rinse mouth three times, swirling water around
wudu_step_4: Rinse nose three times by sniffing water in and blowing out
wudu_step_5: Wash face three times from forehead to chin, ear to ear
wudu_step_6: Wash arms up to elbows three times (right then left)
wudu_step_7: Wipe head with wet hands from front to back
wudu_step_8: Wipe inside and outside of ears with wet fingers
wudu_step_9: Wash feet up to ankles three times (right then left)
prayer_step_1: Qiyam: Stand upright facing Qibla with hands at sides
prayer_step_2: Takbir: Raise hands and say 'Allahu Akbar'
prayer_step_3: Ruku: Bow down placing hands on knees
prayer_step_4: Sujud: Prostrate touching forehead to ground
opening_dua_translation: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise be to You. Blessed is Your name and exalted is Your majesty. There is no deity but You.
ruku_dua_translation: Glory be to my Lord, the Great
sujud_dua_translation: Glory be to my Lord, the Most High
location_permission_needed_for_mosques: Location is needed to find nearby mosques
location_required_for_mosques: Location is required to display nearby mosques
configure_location_in_settings: Configure your location in settings to find nearby mosques.

toasts.single_device_only: Unauthorized. Please sign in on one device only.
toasts.validation_email_password_required: Please enter your email and password
toasts.validation_email_firstname_required: Please enter your email and first name
toasts.validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email (example: name@email.com)
toasts.validation_password_invalid: Password must contain between 6 and 50 characters
toasts.validation_password_too_short: Password must contain at least 6 characters
toasts.validation_firstname_required: Please enter your first name or username
toasts.validation_firstname_too_short: First name or username must contain at least 2 characters
toasts.validation_firstname_too_long: First name or username cannot exceed 30 characters
toasts.help_firstname_prefilled: This first name has been pre-filled from your settings. You can modify it if you wish.
toasts.help_firstname_empty: Between 2 and 30 characters. You can use your real first name or a username.
toasts.help_password_content:
Required: between 6 and 50 characters.
Recommended: letters, numbers and special characters for more security.

dhikr.la_ilaha_illallah: There is no god but Allah

prayer_step_1_detail: Stand facing the Qibla with pure intention
prayer_step_2_detail: Raise hands to ear level and say the opening takbir
prayer_step_3_detail: Stand upright with hands crossed, recite Al-Fatiha then another surah from the Quran
prayer_step_4_detail: Bow forward (Ruku), hands on knees, say the ruku tasbih at least 3 times
prayer_step_5_detail: Prostrate (Sujud), forehead on ground, say the sujud tasbih at least 3 times
prayer_step_6_detail: Sitting position (Tashahhud) for testimony of faith
prayer_step_7_detail: End with Salam by turning head right then left
prayer_step_8: Final Tashahhud: Prayers upon the Prophet and supplications
prayer_step_8_detail: During the final tashahhud, recite the prayers upon the Prophet (Salawat) then the protection supplication
salawat_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ
salawat_phonetic: Allāhumma ṣalli 'alā Muḥammad, wa 'alā āli Muḥammad, kamā ṣallayta 'alā Ibrāhīm wa 'alā āli Ibrāhīm, innaka ḥamīdun majīd. Allāhumma bārik 'alā Muḥammad, wa 'alā āli Muḥammad, kamā bārakta 'alā Ibrāhīm wa 'alā āli Ibrāhīm, innaka ḥamīdun majīd.
salawat_translation: O Allah, send Your blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad, as You sent Your blessings upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim, You are indeed Praiseworthy and Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are indeed Praiseworthy and Glorious.
protection_dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
protection_phonetic: Allāhumma innī a'ūdhu bika min 'adhābi jahannam, wa min 'adhābil-qabr, wa min fitnatil-maḥyā wal-mamāt, wa min sharri fitnatil-masīḥid-dajjāl.
protection_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the false Messiah (al-Masīḥ ad-Dajjāl).
salam_translation: Peace and mercy of Allah be upon you
tashahhud_dua: التَّحِيَّاتُ لِلَّهِ، وَالصَّلَوَاتُ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللهِ الصَّالِحِينَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
tashahhud_phonetic: At-taḥiyyātu lillāh, waṣ-ṣalawātu waṭ-ṭayyibāt. As-salāmu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa raḥmatullāhi wa barakātuh. As-salāmu 'alaynā wa 'alā 'ibādillāhiṣ-ṣāliḥīn. Ash-hadu allā ilāha illa Allāh, wa ash-hadu anna Muḥammadan 'abduhu wa rasūluh.
tashahhud_translation: All salutations, prayers and good things belong to Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity except Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.
full_tashahhud_dua:
التَّحِيَّاتُ لِلَّهِ، وَالصَّلَوَاتُ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللهِ الصَّالِحِينَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ

اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَىٰ آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
full_tashahhud_phonetic:
At-taḥiyyātu lillāh, waṣ-ṣalawātu waṭ-ṭayyibāt. As-salāmu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa raḥmatullāhi wa barakātuh. As-salāmu 'alaynā wa 'alā 'ibādillāhiṣ-ṣāliḥīn. Ash-hadu allā ilāha illa Allāh, wa ash-hadu anna Muḥammadan 'abduhu wa rasūluh.

Allāhumma ṣalli 'alā Muḥammad, wa 'alā āli Muḥammad, kamā ṣallayta 'alā Ibrāhīm wa 'alā āli Ibrāhīm, innaka ḥamīdun majīd. Allāhumma bārik 'alā Muḥammad, wa 'alā āli Muḥammad, kamā bārakta 'alā Ibrāhīm wa 'alā āli Ibrāhīm, innaka ḥamīdun majīd.

Allāhumma innī a'ūdhu bika min 'adhābi jahannam, wa min 'adhābil-qabr, wa min fitnatil-maḥyā wal-mamāt, wa min sharri fitnatil-masīḥid-dajjāl.
full_tashahhud_translation:
All salutations, prayers and good things belong to Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity except Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

O Allah, send Your blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad, as You sent Your blessings upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim, You are indeed Praiseworthy and Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are indeed Praiseworthy and Glorious.

O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the false Messiah (al-Masīḥ ad-Dajjāl).
